description: This is introduction text to tell the user what the process is for creating a new cluster of media
defaultMessage: Create a new media cluster in this workspace by adding the first piece of media for the new cluster.

description: This description is to let the user know what types of media can be created
defaultMessage: Media in a cluster can be a URL, block of text, image, audio, or video.

description: This is a label for the text-based component to let the use know what type of media will be created
Placeholder text for the media URL input
defaultMessage: Add a URL to a social media post or webpage, or a block of text.

description: Label for the text input for claim title
This is a label for the audio visual upload media component to let the use know what type of media will be created
Label on a button that the user clicks in order to return a file upload box back to its 'empty' state.
